creator: jwilliams@softvision.com
summary: Make mozregression work with localized builds

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

comments.text: Is there support for the AR Locale on Mozregression? If not is this something within the scope?
comments.author: jwilliams@softvision.com

comments.text: Justin, could you give more details about what you'd expect here (and also what you were trying to do)? I don't know much about how internationalization works @ Mozilla, my understanding is that we repacked Firefox with specific locales only for release/beta versions which isn't mozregression's speciality.
comments.author: wlachance@mozilla.com

comments.text: What I was trying to do was find the regression range on an issue that only showed up on the AR locale. I ended up bisecting the builds myself.
comments.author: jwilliams@softvision.com

comments.text:
(In reply to William Lachance (:wlach) (use needinfo!) from comment #1)
> could you give more details about what you'd expect here (and also
> what you were trying to do)?

It would be useful for mozregression (and mozregression-gui) to test Nightly builds in specific locales. For example Japanese, for bug 1452050.

> my understanding is that we repacked Firefox with specific locales only for release/beta versions

https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/nightly/latest-mozilla-central-l10n/
comments.author: gingerbread_man@live.com

comments.text: FYI, I opened bug 1452567 for the same reason, should I dupe it to this one?
comments.author: pascalc@gmail.com

comments.text: *** Bug 1452567 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
comments.author: gingerbread_man@live.com

comments.text: I agree this would be desirable and it does sound implementable, but am not sure when I will have time to work on it. If I can find a spare hour or two in the next few weeks, I will poke into it. Leaving unassigned for now.
comments.author: wlachance@mozilla.com

comments.text: This will really help us on bug such as 1467040 , look forward to that.
comments.author: irvin@mail.moztw.org

changes.added: Make mozregression work with localized builds
